name: REFLAIM
description:
Fullscreen recommended!

Dodge A LOT of bullets, pick up upgrades and destroy enemies in this endless bullet-hell shooter game!

Concept:

Try to survive while the enemies aren't even shooting at you! It's harder than it sounds tho. They are instead shooting at your mouse cursor, because you are reflecting their aim towards it.

Can you beat my highscore of 140 defeated enemies? I bet you can't. Comment your highscore bellow!

Download the game for better performance.

How to play:

Aim with your mouse and your jet will automatically shoot.

Use "WASD" or arrow keys to move

This game was made in less than 3 days for the Mini Jam 121: Reflection

Theme: Reflection

Limitation: Window as a Mechanic

art and music - made by myself during the jam

Headphones recommended!
